issue.title: [Python] Stop skipping dask tests on integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17108](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17108). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There were some tests on our nightly dask integration job being skipped due to old issues on dask. The original issues:

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15720

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9353

This issues have been solved for some time:

<https://github.com/dask/dask/issues/6243>

<https://github.com/dask/dask/issues/6374>

We should stop skipping the tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17108?focusedCommentId=17568512) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13636
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13636>
